QuestData.Title: Monstrous Matchmaker
QuestData.Description: We have a problem, a matter of love, and you've come just in time. $b$bTwo white brutosaurs, de male Ben'jin and de female Maka'fon, are de last of their kind. De rest have passed on. $b$bDese two are not in de mood for love. If you can help my new friend Cala and myself, dis may be de only chance to give dem a future. $b$bPlace my voodoo totem close to each one so dat I can feel what dey feel and learn how we can help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Witch Doctor Jangalar's Voodoo Totem near both brutosaurs.
